column1: Relate the momentum of an object to the velocity vector and mass.
Determine the direction of an object's momentum.
Identify objects as being either internal or external to a system.
Determine the impulse delivered to an object from the average applied force and duration of the force.
Use conservation of momentum in one-dimension to solve for an unknown parameter from either before or after a collision.
Identify whether a collision is elastic or inelastic.
Specify condition under which both momentum and kinetic energy of a system are conserved.
